Html:
Will Ribbon for wpf provide a "RibbonPage" class used for XBAP style applications?

According to another project "WPF C# Ribbon Control Library" http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/ribboncontrol.aspx . It's 1.0.0.6 added a RibbonPage class.

Is there a plan to add RibbonPage feature in this project? Or it's not needed already?

Thank you!
